children.name: abominations
children.sourceText: And thus commandeth the Father that I should say unto you: At that day when the Gentiles shall sin against my gospel, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, and shall be lifted up in the pride of their hearts above all nations, and above all the people of the whole earth, and shall be filled with all manner of...secret abominations; and if they shall do all those things, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, saith the Father,

children.name: Abraham
children.sourceText: And behold, ye are the children of the prophets; and ye are of the house of Israel; and ye are of the covenant which the Father made with your fathers, saying unto Abraham:

children.name: add
children.sourceText: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?

children.name: added
children.sourceText: But seek ye first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things shall be added unto you.

children.name: adultery
children.sourceText: Behold, it is written by them of old time, that thou shalt not commit adultery;

children.name: adversary
children.sourceText: Agree with thine adversary quickly while thou art in the way with him, lest at any time he shall get thee, and thou shalt be cast into prison.

children.name: afflicted
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: agree
children.sourceText: Agree with thine adversary quickly while thou art in the way with him, lest at any time he shall get thee, and thou shalt be cast into prison.

children.name: air
children.sourceText: Behold the fowls of the air, for they sow not, neither do they reap nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

children.name: alms
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say that I would that ye should do alms unto the poor; but take heed that ye do not your alms before men to be seen of them; otherwise ye have no reward of your Father who is in heaven.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: Behold, I am Jesus Christ, whom the prophets testified shall come into the world.

children.name: angels
children.sourceText: And now, behold, my joy is great, even unto fulness, because of you, and also this generation; yea, and even the Father rejoiceth, and also all the holy angels, because of you and this generation; for none of them are lost.

children.name: anger
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: anoint
children.sourceText: But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thy head, and wash thy face;

children.name: apostles
children.sourceText: Ye shall call on the Father in my name, in mighty prayer; and after ye have done this ye shall have power that to him upon whom ye shall lay your hands, ye shall give the Holy Ghost; and in my name shall ye give it, for thus do mine apostles.

children.name: appear
children.sourceText: Moreover, when ye fast be not as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance, for they disfigure their faces that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: are
children.sourceText: And now behold, these are the words which ye shall say, calling them by name, saying:

children.name: arise
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: arrayed
children.sourceText: And yet I say unto you, that even Solomon, in all his glory, was not arrayed like one of these.

children.name: art
children.sourceText: Agree with thine adversary quickly while thou art in the way with him, lest at any time he shall get thee, and thou shalt be cast into prison.

children.name: ascended
children.sourceText: I give unto you power that ye shall baptize this people when I am again ascended into heaven.

children.name: ask
children.sourceText: Be not ye therefore like unto them, for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of before ye ask him.

children.name: asketh
children.sourceText: Give to him that asketh thee, and from him that would borrow of thee turn not away.

children.name: assist
children.sourceText: And they shall assist my people, the remnant of Jacob, and also as many of the house of Israel as shall come, that they may build a city, which shall be called the New Jerusalem.

children.name: aught
children.sourceText: Therefore, if ye shall come unto me, or shall desire to come unto me, and rememberest that thy brother hast aught against thee,

children.name: authority
children.sourceText: Having authority given me of Jesus Christ, I baptize you in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost. Amen.

children.name: baptize
children.sourceText: I give unto you power that ye shall baptize this people when I am again ascended into heaven.

children.name: baptized
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, that whoso repenteth of his sins through your words, and desireth to be baptized in my name, on this wise shall ye baptize them, Behold, ye shall go down and stand in the water, and in my name shall ye baptize them.

children.name: barns
children.sourceText: Behold the fowls of the air, for they sow not, neither do they reap nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

children.name: be
children.sourceText: On this wise shall ye baptize; and there shall be no disputations among you.

children.name: beam
children.sourceText: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

children.name: bear
children.sourceText: And this is my doctrine, and it is the doctrine which the Father hath given unto me; and I bear record of the Father, and the Father beareth record of me, and the Holy Ghost beareth record of the Father and me; and I bear record that the Father commandeth all men, everywhere, to repent and believe in me.

children.name: beareth
children.sourceText: And this is my doctrine, and it is the doctrine which the Father hath given unto me; and I bear record of the Father, and the Father beareth record of me, and the Holy Ghost beareth record of the Father and me; and I bear record that the Father commandeth all men, everywhere, to repent and believe in me.

children.name: beat
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: become
children.sourceText: And again I say unto you, ye must repent, and become as a little child, and be baptized in my name, or ye can in nowise receive these things.

children.name: been
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: begin
children.sourceText: And when these things come to pass that thy seed shall begin to know these things, it shall be a sign unto them, that they may know that the work of the Father hath already commenced unto the fulfilling of the covenant which he hath made unto the people who are of the house of Israel.

children.name: beginning
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: beholdest
children.sourceText: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

children.name: behooveth
children.sourceText: For thus it behooveth the Father that it should come forth from the Gentiles, that he may show forth his power unto the Gentiles, for this cause that the Gentiles, if they will not harden their hearts, that they may repent and come unto me and be baptized in my name and know of the true points of my doctrine, that they may be numbered among my people, O house of Israel;

children.name: being
children.sourceText: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father who is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?

children.name: belief
children.sourceText: And blessed are the Gentiles, because of their belief in me, in and of the Holy Ghost, which witnesses unto them of me and of the Father.

children.name: believe
children.sourceText: And this is my doctrine, and it is the doctrine which the Father hath given unto me; and I bear record of the Father, and the Father beareth record of me, and the Holy Ghost beareth record of the Father and me; and I bear record that the Father commandeth all men, everywhere, to repent and believe in me.

children.name: believeth
children.sourceText: And whoso believeth in me, and is baptized, the same shall be saved; and they are they who shall inherit the kingdom of God.

children.name: believing
children.sourceText: And whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, which is right, believing that ye shall receive, behold it shall be given unto you.

children.name: beware
children.sourceText: Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

children.name: black
children.sourceText: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair black or white;

children.name: bless
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them who despitefully use you and persecute you;

children.name: blessing
children.sourceText: And I say unto you, that if the Gentiles do not repent after the blessing which they shall receive, after they have scattered my people,

children.name: blew
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

children.name: blood
children.sourceText: And this shall ye always do to those who repent and are baptized in my name; and ye shall do it in remembrance of my blood, which I have shed for you, that ye may witness unto the Father that ye do always remember me. And if ye do always remember me ye shall have my Spirit to be with you.

children.name: blow
children.sourceText: But whoso among you shall do more or less than these are not built upon my rock, but are built upon a sandy foundation; and when the rain descends, and the floods come, and the winds blow, and beat upon them, they shall fall, and the gates of hell are ready open to receive them.

children.name: body
children.sourceText: The light of the body is the eye; if, therefore, thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.

children.name: books
children.sourceText: For behold, out of the books which have been written, and which shall be written, shall this people be judged, for by them shall their works be known unto men.

children.name: borrow
children.sourceText: Give to him that asketh thee, and from him that would borrow of thee turn not away.

children.name: bowels
children.sourceText: Behold, my bowels are filled with compassion towards you.

children.name: bread
children.sourceText: Or what man is there of you, who, if his son ask bread, will give him a stone?

children.name: break
children.sourceText: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and thieves break through and steal;

children.name: breaketh
children.sourceText: And ye see that I have commanded that none of you should go away, but rather have commanded that ye should come unto me, that ye might feel and see; even so shall ye do unto the world; and whosoever breaketh this commandment suffereth himself to be led into temptation.

children.name: brethren
children.sourceText: And not at any time hath the Father given me commandment that I should tell it unto your brethren at Jerusalem.

children.name: bring
children.sourceText: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.

children.name: bringeth
children.sourceText: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

children.name: bringing
children.sourceText: Nevertheless, ye shall not cast him out of your synagogues, or your places of worship, for unto such shall ye continue to minister; for ye know not but what they will return and repent, and come unto me with full purpose of heart, and I shall heal them; and ye shall be the means of bringing salvation unto them.

children.name: brother
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, that whosoever is angry with his brother shall be in danger of his judgment. And whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council; and whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: brother's
children.sourceText: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: And I command you that ye shall write these sayings after I am gone, that...these sayings which ye shall write shall be kept and shall be manifested unto the Gentiles, that through the fulness of the Gentiles, the remnant of their seed, who shall be scattered forth upon the face of the earth because of their unbelief, may be brought in, or may be brought to a knowledge of me, their Redeemer.

children.name: build
children.sourceText: And they shall assist my people, the remnant of Jacob, and also as many of the house of Israel as shall come, that they may build a city, which shall be called the New Jerusalem.

children.name: buildeth
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that this is my doctrine, and whoso buildeth upon this buildeth upon my rock, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against them.

children.name: built
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: bushel
children.sourceText: Behold, do men light a candle and put it under a bushel? Nay, but on a candlestick, and it giveth light to all that are in the house;

children.name: byword
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: call
children.sourceText: Yea, the work shall commence among all the dispersed of my people, with the Father to prepare the way whereby they may come unto me, that they may call on the Father in my name.

children.name: called
children.sourceText: And blessed are all the peacemakers, for they shall be called the children of God.

children.name: calling
children.sourceText: And now behold, these are the words which ye shall say, calling them by name, saying:

children.name: came
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

children.name: candle
children.sourceText: Behold, do men light a candle and put it under a bushel? Nay, but on a candlestick, and it giveth light to all that are in the house;

children.name: candlestick
children.sourceText: Behold, do men light a candle and put it under a bushel? Nay, but on a candlestick, and it giveth light to all that are in the house;

children.name: cannot
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the light of this people. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid.

children.name: canst
children.sourceText: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair black or white;

children.name: captive
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, ye must watch and pray always, lest ye be tempted by the devil, and ye be led away captive by him.

children.name: case
children.sourceText: Therefore come unto me and be ye saved; for verily I say unto you, that except ye shall keep my commandments, which I have commanded you at this time, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.

children.name: cast
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the salt of the earth; but if the salt shall lose its savor wherewith shall the earth be salted? The salt shall be thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out and to be trodden under foot of men.

children.name: cause
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery; and whoso shall marry her who is divorced committeth adultery.

children.name: caused
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: causeth
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery; and whoso shall marry her who is divorced committeth adultery.

children.name: changed
children.sourceText: And ye shall never endure the pains of death; but when I shall come in my glory ye shall be changed in the twinkling of an eye from mortality to immortality; and then shall ye be blessed in the kingdom of my Father.

children.name: cheek
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, that ye shall not resist evil, but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also;

children.name: child
children.sourceText: And again I say unto you, ye must repent, and become as a little child, and be baptized in my name, or ye can in nowise receive these things.

children.name: children
children.sourceText: And blessed are all the peacemakers, for they shall be called the children of God.

children.name: chosen
children.sourceText: Blessed are ye if ye shall give heed unto the words of these twelve whom I have chosen from among you to minister unto you, and to be your servants; and unto them I have given power that they may baptize you with water; and after that ye are baptized with water, behold, I will baptize you with fire and with the Holy Ghost; therefore blessed are ye if ye shall believe in me and be baptized, after that ye have seen me and know that I am.

children.name: Christ
children.sourceText: Behold, I am Jesus Christ, whom the prophets testified shall come into the world.

children.name: church
children.sourceText: Behold there shall one be ordained among you, and to him will I give power that he shall break bread and bless it and give it unto the people of my church, unto all those who shall believe and be baptized in my name.

children.name: city
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the light of this people. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid.

children.name: cloak
children.sourceText: And if any man will sue thee at the law and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloak also;

children.name: closet
children.sourceText: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father who is in secret; and thy Father, who seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.

children.name: clothe
children.sourceText: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which today is, and tomorrow is cast into the oven, even so will he clothe you, if ye are not of little faith.

children.name: clothed
children.sourceText: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?

children.name: clothing
children.sourceText: Beware of false prophets, who come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

children.name: coat
children.sourceText: And if any man will sue thee at the law and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloak also;

children.name: cometh
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: comforted
children.sourceText: And again, blessed are all they that mourn, for they shall be comforted.

children.name: coming
children.sourceText: And behold, ye shall meet together oft; and ye shall not forbid any man from coming unto you when ye shall meet together, but suffer them that they may come unto you and forbid them not;

children.name: command
children.sourceText: This much did the Father command me, that I should tell unto them:

children.name: commanded
children.sourceText: And according as I have commanded you thus shall ye baptize. And there shall be no disputations among you, as there have hitherto been; neither shall there be disputations among you concerning the points of my doctrine, as there have hitherto been.

children.name: commandeth
children.sourceText: And this is my doctrine, and it is the doctrine which the Father hath given unto me; and I bear record of the Father, and the Father beareth record of me, and the Holy Ghost beareth record of the Father and me; and I bear record that the Father commandeth all men, everywhere, to repent and believe in me.

children.name: commandment
children.sourceText: Behold, I give unto you a commandment, that ye suffer none of these things to enter into your heart;

children.name: commandments
children.sourceText: And behold, I have given you the law and the commandments of my Father, that ye shall believe in me, and that ye shall repent of your sins, and come unto me with a broken heart and a contrite spirit. Behold, ye have the commandments before you, and the law is fulfilled.

children.name: commence
children.sourceText: And then shall the work of the Father commence at that day, even when this gospel shall be preached among the remnant of this people. Verily I say unto you, at that day shall the work of the Father commence among all the dispersed of my people, yea, even the tribes which have been lost, which the Father hath led away out of Jerusalem.

children.name: commenced
children.sourceText: And when these things come to pass that thy seed shall begin to know these things, it shall be a sign unto them, that they may know that the work of the Father hath already commenced unto the fulfilling of the covenant which he hath made unto the people who are of the house of Israel.

children.name: commit
children.sourceText: Behold, it is written by them of old time, that thou shalt not commit adultery;

children.name: committed
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, that whosoever looketh on a woman, to lust after her, hath committed adultery already in his heart.

children.name: committeth
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery; and whoso shall marry her who is divorced committeth adultery.

children.name: communication
children.sourceText: But let your communication be Yea, yea; Nay, nay; for whatsoever cometh of more than these is evil.

children.name: compassion
children.sourceText: Behold, my bowels are filled with compassion towards you.

children.name: compel
children.sourceText: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile, go with him twain.

children.name: condemnation
children.sourceText: Therefore, keep these sayings which I have commanded you that ye come not under condemnation; for wo unto him whom the Father condemneth.

children.name: condemneth
children.sourceText: Therefore, keep these sayings which I have commanded you that ye come not under condemnation; for wo unto him whom the Father condemneth.

children.name: confirm
children.sourceText: And whosoever shall believe in my name, doubting nothing, unto him will I confirm all my words, even unto the ends of the earth.

children.name: consider
children.sourceText: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin;

children.name: considerest
children.sourceText: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?

children.name: contend
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: contention
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: continue
children.sourceText: Nevertheless, ye shall not cast him out of your synagogues, or your places of worship, for unto such shall ye continue to minister; for ye know not but what they will return and repent, and come unto me with full purpose of heart, and I shall heal them; and ye shall be the means of bringing salvation unto them.

children.name: converted
children.sourceText: And they understood me not, for they supposed it had been the Gentiles; for they understood not that the Gentiles should be converted through their preaching.

children.name: corners
children.sourceText: And when thou prayest thou shalt not do as the hypocrites, for they love to pray, standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: council
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, that whosoever is angry with his brother shall be in danger of his judgment. And whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council; and whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: countenance
children.sourceText: Moreover, when ye fast be not as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance, for they disfigure their faces that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: covenant
children.sourceText: For behold, the covenant which I have made with my people is not all fulfilled; but the law which was given unto Moses hath an end in me.

children.name: covenanted
children.sourceText: Behold, I am he that gave the law, and I am he who covenanted with my people Israel; therefore, the law in me is fulfilled, for I have come to fulfil the law; therefore it hath an end.

children.name: creature
children.sourceText: Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature;

children.name: cry
children.sourceText: And then shall a cry go forth:

children.name: cubit
children.sourceText: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?

children.name: cup
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: curse
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them who despitefully use you and persecute you;

children.name: cut
children.sourceText: Therefore it shall come to pass that whosoever will not believe in my words, who am Jesus Christ, which the Father shall cause him to bring forth unto the Gentiles, and shall give unto him power that he shall bring them forth unto the Gentiles, (it shall be done even as Moses said) they shall be cut off from among my people who are of the covenant.

children.name: damnation
children.sourceText: For whoso eateth and drinketh my flesh and blood unworthily eateth and drinketh damnation to his soul; therefore if ye know that a man is unworthy to eat and drink of my flesh and blood ye shall forbid him.

children.name: damned
children.sourceText: And whoso believeth not in me, and is not baptized, shall be damned.

children.name: danger
children.sourceText: Ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, and it is also written before you, that thou shalt not kill, and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment of God;

children.name: darkness
children.sourceText: But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If, therefore, the light that is in thee be darkness, how great is that darkness!

children.name: day
children.sourceText: Take therefore no thought for the morrow, for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient is the day unto the evil thereof.

children.name: dead
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, I commanded my servant Samuel, the Lamanite, that he should testify unto this people, that at the day that the Father should glorify his name in me that there were many saints who should arise from the dead, and should appear unto many, and should minister unto them.Was it not so?

children.name: death
children.sourceText: Enter ye in at the strait gate; for strait is the gate, and narrow is the way that leads to life, and few there be that find it; but wide is the gate, and broad the way which leads to death, and many there be that travel therein, until the night cometh, wherein no man can work.

children.name: debtors
children.sourceText: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

children.name: debts
children.sourceText: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

children.name: deceits
children.sourceText: And thus commandeth the Father that I should say unto you: At that day when the Gentiles shall sin against my gospel, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, and shall be lifted up in the pride of their hearts above all nations, and above all the people of the whole earth, and shall be filled with all manner of lyings, and of deceits, and of mischiefs, and all manner of hypocrisy, and murders, and priestcrafts, and whoredoms, and of secret abominations; and if they shall do all those things, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel,saith the Father,

children.name: deceivings
children.sourceText: And it shall come to pass that all lyings, and deceivings, and envyings, and strifes, and priestcrafts, and whoredoms, shall be done away.

children.name: declare
children.sourceText: Behold, verily, verily, I say unto you, I will declare unto you my doctrine.

children.name: deliver
children.sourceText: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil.

children.name: deny
children.sourceText: For it is better that ye should deny yourselves of these things, wherein ye will take up your cross, than that ye should be cast into hell.

children.name: depart
children.sourceText: And then will I profess unto them: I never knew you; depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

children.name: depths
children.sourceText: And again, more blessed are they who shall believe in your words because that ye shall testify that ye have seen me, and that ye know that I am. Yea, blessed are they who shall believe in your words, and come down into the depths of humility and be baptized, for they shall be visited with fire and with the Holy Ghost, and shall receive a remission of their sins.

children.name: descended
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

children.name: descends
children.sourceText: But whoso among you shall do more or less than these are not built upon my rock, but are built upon a sandy foundation; and when the rain descends, and the floods come, and the winds blow, and beat upon them, they shall fall, and the gates of hell are ready open to receive them.

children.name: desire
children.sourceText: Therefore, if ye shall come unto me, or shall desire to come unto me, and rememberest that thy brother hast aught against thee,

children.name: desired
children.sourceText: Blessed are ye because ye desired this thing of me; therefore, after that ye are seventy and two years old ye shall come unto me in my kingdom; and with me ye shall find rest.

children.name: desireth
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, that whoso repenteth of his sins through your words, and desireth to be baptized in my name, on this wise shall ye baptize them, Behold, ye shall go down and stand in the water, and in my name shall ye baptize them.

children.name: despise
children.sourceText: No man can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other, or else he will hold to the one and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and Mammon.

children.name: destroy
children.sourceText: Think not that I am come to destroy the law or the prophets. I am not come to destroy but to fulfil;

children.name: destruction
children.sourceText: Enter ye in at the strait gate; for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, which leadeth to destruction, and many there be who go in thereat;

children.name: devil
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: devils
children.sourceText: Many will say to me in that day: Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name, and in thy name have cast out devils, and in thy name done many wonderful works?

children.name: did
children.sourceText: This much did the Father command me, that I should tell unto them:

children.name: disciples
children.sourceText: Ye are my disciples; and ye are a light unto this people, who are a remnant of the house of Joseph.

children.name: disfigure
children.sourceText: Moreover, when ye fast be not as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance, for they disfigure their faces that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: dispersed
children.sourceText: And then shall the work of the Father commence at that day, even when this gospel shall be preached among the remnant of this people. Verily I say unto you, at that day shall the work of the Father commence among all the dispersed of my people, yea, even the tribes which have been lost, which the Father hath led away out of Jerusalem.

children.name: dispersion
children.sourceText: And verily I say unto you, I give unto you a sign, that ye may know the time when these things shall be about to take place that I shall gather in, from their long dispersion, my people, O house of Israel, and shall establish again among them my Zion;

children.name: disputations
children.sourceText: On this wise shall ye baptize; and there shall be no disputations among you.

children.name: dispute
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, why is it that the people should murmur and dispute because of this thing?

children.name: divorced
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery; and whoso shall marry her who is divorced committeth adultery.

children.name: divorcement
children.sourceText: It hath been written, that whosoever shall put away his wife, let him give her a writing of divorcement.

children.name: do
children.sourceText: And blessed are all they who do hunger and thirst after righteousness, for they shall be filled with the Holy Ghost.

children.name: doctrine
children.sourceText: And according as I have commanded you thus shall ye baptize. And there shall be no disputations among you, as there have hitherto been; neither shall there be disputations among you concerning the points of my doctrine, as there have hitherto been.

children.name: doest
children.sourceText: But when thou doest alms let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth;

children.name: doeth
children.sourceText: But when thou doest alms let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth;

children.name: dogs
children.sourceText: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.

children.name: doings
children.sourceText: Therefore, more blessed are ye, for ye shall never taste of death; but ye shall live to behold all the doings of the Father unto the children of men, even until all things shall be fulfilled according to the will of the Father, when I shall come in my glory with the powers of heaven.

children.name: done
children.sourceText: Behold, this is not my doctrine, to stir up the hearts of men with anger, one against another; but this is my doctrine, that such things should be done away.

children.name: door
children.sourceText: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father who is in secret; and thy Father, who seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.

children.name: doth
children.sourceText: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and thieves break through and steal;

children.name: doubting
children.sourceText: And whosoever shall believe in my name, doubting nothing, unto him will I confirm all my words, even unto the ends of the earth.

children.name: draw
children.sourceText: And my Father sent me that I might be lifted up upon the cross; and after that I had been lifted up upon the cross, that I might draw all men unto me, that as I have been lifted up by men even so should men be lifted up by the Father, to stand before me, to be judged of their works, whether they be good or whether they be evil,

children.name: drink
children.sourceText: Remember the words which I have spoken. For behold, ye are they whom I have chosen to minister unto this people. Therefore I say unto you, take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

children.name: drinketh
children.sourceText: For whoso eateth and drinketh my flesh and blood unworthily eateth and drinketh damnation to his soul; therefore if ye know that a man is unworthy to eat and drink of my flesh and blood ye shall forbid him.

children.name: drunk
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: dwell
children.sourceText: And again, ye shall not have pain while ye shall dwell in the flesh, neither sorrow save it be for the sins of the world; and all this will I do because of the thing which ye have desired of me, for ye have desired that ye might bring the souls of men unto me, while the world shall stand.

children.name: dwindle
children.sourceText: Therefore, when these works and the works which shall be wrought among you hereafter shall come forth from the Gentiles, unto your seed which shall dwindle in unbelief because of iniquity;

children.name: earth
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: eat
children.sourceText: Remember the words which I have spoken. For behold, ye are they whom I have chosen to minister unto this people. Therefore I say unto you, take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

children.name: eateth
children.sourceText: For whoso eateth and drinketh my flesh and blood unworthily eateth and drinketh damnation to his soul; therefore if ye know that a man is unworthy to eat and drink of my flesh and blood ye shall forbid him.

children.name: end
children.sourceText: Behold, I am he that gave the law, and I am he who covenanted with my people Israel; therefore, the law in me is fulfilled, for I have come to fulfil the law; therefore it hath an end.

children.name: ends
children.sourceText: Therefore, go forth unto this people, and declare the words which I have spoken, unto the ends of the earth.

children.name: endurance
children.sourceText: In the name of Jesus Christ I ordain you to be a priest (or if he be a teacher, I ordain you to be a teacher) to preach repentance and remission of sins through Jesus Christ, by the endurance of faith on his name to the end. Amen.

children.name: endure
children.sourceText: Behold, I am the law, and the light. Look unto me, and endure to the end, and ye shall live; for unto him that endureth to the end will I give eternal life.

children.name: endureth
children.sourceText: Behold, I am the law, and the light. Look unto me, and endure to the end, and ye shall live; for unto him that endureth to the end will I give eternal life.

children.name: enemies
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them who despitefully use you and persecute you;

children.name: enemy
children.sourceText: And behold it is written also, that thou shalt love thy neighbor and hate thine enemy;

children.name: enter
children.sourceText: Therefore come unto me and be ye saved; for verily I say unto you, that except ye shall keep my commandments, which I have commanded you at this time, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.

children.name: entereth
children.sourceText: And no unclean thing can enter into his kingdom; therefore nothing entereth into his rest save it be those who have washed their garments in my blood, because of their faith, and the repentance of all their sins, and their faithfulness unto the end.

children.name: envyings
children.sourceText: And it shall come to pass that all lyings, and deceivings, and envyings, and strifes, and priestcrafts, and whoredoms, shall be done away.

children.name: establish
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: established
children.sourceText: For it is wisdom in the Father that they should be established in this land, and be set up as a free people by the power of the Father, that these things might come forth from them unto a remnant of your seed, that the covenant of the Father may be fulfilled which he hath covenanted with his people, O house of Israel;

children.name: everywhere
children.sourceText: And this is my doctrine, and it is the doctrine which the Father hath given unto me; and I bear record of the Father, and the Father beareth record of me, and the Holy Ghost beareth record of the Father and me; and I bear record that the Father commandeth all men, everywhere, to repent and believe in me.

children.name: evil
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: example
children.sourceText: And as I have prayed among you even so shall ye pray in my church, among my people who do repent and are baptized in my name. Behold I am the light; I have set an example for you.

children.name: eye
children.sourceText: And behold, it is written, an eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth;

children.name: face
children.sourceText: But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thy head, and wash thy face;

children.name: faces
children.sourceText: Moreover, when ye fast be not as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance, for they disfigure their faces that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: faith
children.sourceText: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which today is, and tomorrow is cast into the oven, even so will he clothe you, if ye are not of little faith.

children.name: faithfulness
children.sourceText: And no unclean thing can enter into his kingdom; therefore nothing entereth into his rest save it be those who have washed their garments in my blood, because of their faith, and the repentance of all their sins, and their faithfulness unto the end.

children.name: fall
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell, and great was the fall of it.

children.name: families
children.sourceText: Pray in your families unto the Father, always in my name, that your wives and your children may be blessed.

children.name: father
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: fathers
children.sourceText: And behold, ye are the children of the prophets; and ye are of the house of Israel; and ye are of the covenant which the Father made with your fathers, saying unto Abraham:

children.name: feedeth
children.sourceText: Behold the fowls of the air, for they sow not, neither do they reap nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

children.name: feel
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: feet
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: fell
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

children.name: field
children.sourceText: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin;

children.name: figs
children.sourceText: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

children.name: filled
children.sourceText: And blessed are all they who do hunger and thirst after righteousness, for they shall be filled with the Holy Ghost.

children.name: find
children.sourceText: Ask, and it shall be given unto you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

children.name: findeth
children.sourceText: For every one that asketh, receiveth; and he that seeketh, findeth; and to him that knocketh, it shall be opened.

children.name: finish
children.sourceText: Behold now I finish the commandment which the Father hath commanded me concerning this people, who are a remnant of the house of Israel.

children.name: fire
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that this is my doctrine, and I bear record of it from the Father; and whoso believeth in me believeth in the Father also; and unto him will the Father bear record of me, for he will visit him with fire and with the Holy Ghost.

children.name: fish
children.sourceText: Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?

children.name: flesh
children.sourceText: And now behold, this is the commandment which I give unto you, that ye shall not suffer any one knowingly to partake of my flesh and blood unworthily, when ye shall minister it;

children.name: floods
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: fold
children.sourceText: That other sheep I have which are not of this fold; them also I must bring, and they shall hear my voice; and there shall be one fold, and one shepherd.

children.name: follow
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, yea, and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after, as many as have spoken, have testified of me.

children.name: fool
children.sourceText: But I say unto you, that whosoever is angry with his brother shall be in danger of his judgment. And whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council; and whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.

children.name: foot
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the salt of the earth; but if the salt shall lose its savor wherewith shall the earth be salted? The salt shall be thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out and to be trodden under foot of men.

children.name: footstool
children.sourceText: Nor by the earth, for it is his footstool;

children.name: forbid
children.sourceText: And behold, ye shall meet together oft; and ye shall not forbid any man from coming unto you when ye shall meet together, but suffer them that they may come unto you and forbid them not;

children.name: forgive
children.sourceText: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

children.name: fornication
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery; and whoso shall marry her who is divorced committeth adultery.

children.name: forswear
children.sourceText: And again it is written, thou shalt not forswear thyself, but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths;

children.name: foundation
children.sourceText: And whoso shall declare more or less than this, and establish it for my doctrine, the same cometh of evil, and is not built upon my rock; but he buildeth upon a sandy foundation, and the gates of hell stand open to receive such when the floods come and the winds beat upon them.

children.name: founded
children.sourceText: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not, for it was founded upon a rock.

children.name: fowls
children.sourceText: Behold the fowls of the air, for they sow not, neither do they reap nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

children.name: fruit
children.sourceText: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.

children.name: fruits
children.sourceText: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

children.name: fulfil
children.sourceText: Think not that I am come to destroy the law or the prophets. I am not come to destroy but to fulfil;

children.name: fulfilled
children.sourceText: For verily I say unto you, one jot nor tittle hath not passed away from the law, but in me it hath all been fulfilled.

children.name: fulfilleth
children.sourceText: And after that ye were blessed then fulfilleth the Father the covenant which he made with Abraham, saying:

children.name: fulfilling
children.sourceText: Blessed are ye for this thing which ye have done, for this is fulfilling my commandments, and this doth witness unto the Father that ye are willing to do that which I have commanded you.

children.name: future
children.sourceText: These scriptures, which ye had not with you, the Father commanded that I should give unto you; for it was wisdom in him that they should be given unto future generations.

children.name: garments
children.sourceText: And no unclean thing can enter into his kingdom; therefore nothing entereth into his rest save it be those who have washed their garments in my blood, because of their faith, and the repentance of all their sins, and their faithfulness unto the end.

children.name: gate
children.sourceText: Enter ye in at the strait gate; for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, which leadeth to destruction, and many there be who go in thereat;

children.name: gates
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that this is my doctrine, and whoso buildeth upon this buildeth upon my rock, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against them.

children.name: gather
children.sourceText: Behold the fowls of the air, for they sow not, neither do they reap nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

children.name: gathered
children.sourceText: And then shall the remnants, which shall be scattered abroad upon the face of the earth, be gathered in from the east and from the west, and from the south and from the north; and they shall be brought to the knowledge of the Lord their God, who hath redeemed them.

children.name: gave
children.sourceText: Behold, I am he that gave the law, and I am he who covenanted with my people Israel; therefore, the law in me is fulfilled, for I have come to fulfil the law; therefore it hath an end.

children.name: generation
children.sourceText: And now, behold, my joy is great, even unto fulness, because of you, and also this generation; yea, and even the Father rejoiceth, and also all the holy angels, because of you and this generation; for none of them are lost.

children.name: generations
children.sourceText: These scriptures, which ye had not with you, the Father commanded that I should give unto you; for it was wisdom in him that they should be given unto future generations.

children.name: Gentiles
children.sourceText: And they understood me not, for they supposed it had been the Gentiles; for they understood not that the Gentiles should be converted through their preaching.

children.name: get
children.sourceText: Agree with thine adversary quickly while thou art in the way with him, lest at any time he shall get thee, and thou shalt be cast into prison.

children.name: ghost
children.sourceText: Having authority given me of Jesus Christ, I baptize you in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost. Amen.

children.name: gifts
children.sourceText: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father who is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?

children.name: give
children.sourceText: I give unto you power that ye shall baptize this people when I am again ascended into heaven.

children.name: giveth
children.sourceText: Behold, do men light a candle and put it under a bushel? Nay, but on a candlestick, and it giveth light to all that are in the house;

children.name: glorified
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: glorify
children.sourceText: Therefore let your light so shine before this people, that they may see your good works and glorify your Father who is in heaven.

children.name: glory
children.sourceText: Therefore, when ye shall do your alms do not sound a trumpet before you, as will hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: go
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, that whoso repenteth of his sins through your words, and desireth to be baptized in my name, on this wise shall ye baptize them, Behold, ye shall go down and stand in the water, and in my name shall ye baptize them.

children.name: God
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: God's
children.sourceText: But verily, verily, I say unto you, swear not at all; neither by heaven, for it is God's throne;

children.name: gold
children.sourceText: But behold, it sorroweth me because of the fourth generation from this generation, for they are led away captive by him even as was the son of perdition; for they will sell me for silver and for gold, and for that which moth doth corrupt and which thieves can break through and steal. And in that day will I visit them, even in turning their works upon their own heads.

children.name: gone
children.sourceText: And I command you that ye shall write these sayings after I am gone, that if it so be that my people at Jerusalem, they who have seen me and been with me in my ministry, do not ask the Father in my name, that they may receive a knowledge of you by the Holy Ghost, and also of the other tribes whom they know not of, that these sayings which ye shall write shall be kept and shall be manifested unto the Gentiles, that through the fulness of the Gentiles, the remnant of their seed, who shall be scattered forth upon the face of the earth because of their unbelief, may be brought in, or may be brought to a knowledge of me, their Redeemer.

children.name: gospel
children.sourceText: And thus commandeth the Father that I should say unto you: At that day when the Gentiles shall sin against my gospel, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, and shall be lifted up in the pride of their hearts above all nations, and above all the people of the whole earth, and shall be filled with all manner of...secret abominations; and if they shall do all those things, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, saith the Father,

children.name: grapes
children.sourceText: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?

children.name: grass
children.sourceText: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which today is, and tomorrow is cast into the oven, even so will he clothe you, if ye are not of little faith.

children.name: grow
children.sourceText: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin;

children.name: had
children.sourceText: Marvel not that I said unto you that old things had passed away, and that all things had become new.

children.name: hair
children.sourceText: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair black or white;

children.name: halt
children.sourceText: Have ye any that are sick among you? Bring them hither. Have ye any that are lame, or blind, or halt, or maimed, or leprous, or that are withered, or that are deaf, or that are afflicted in any manner? Bring them hither and I will heal them, for I have compassion upon you; my bowels are filled with mercy.

children.name: hand
children.sourceText: But when thou doest alms let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth;

children.name: hands
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: harden
children.sourceText: For thus it behooveth the Father that it should come forth from the Gentiles, that he may show forth his power unto the Gentiles, for this cause that the Gentiles, if they will not harden their hearts, that they may repent and come unto me and be baptized in my name and know of the true points of my doctrine, that they may be numbered among my people, O house of Israel;

children.name: hast
children.sourceText: Therefore, if ye shall come unto me, or shall desire to come unto me, and rememberest that thy brother hast aught against thee,

children.name: hate
children.sourceText: And behold it is written also, that thou shalt love thy neighbor and hate thine enemy;

children.name: hated
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: hath
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: have
children.sourceText: And behold, I am the light and the life of the world; and I have drunk out of that bitter cup which the Father hath given me, and have glorified the Father in taking upon me the sins of the world, in the which I have suffered the will of the Father in all things from the beginning.

children.name: having
children.sourceText: Having authority given me of Jesus Christ, I baptize you in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost. Amen.

children.name: head
children.sourceText: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair black or white;

children.name: heads
children.sourceText: But behold, it sorroweth me because of the fourth generation from this generation, for they are led away captive by him even as was the son of perdition; for they will sell me for silver and for gold, and for that which moth doth corrupt and which thieves can break through and steal. And in that day will I visit them, even in turning their works upon their own heads.

children.name: heal
children.sourceText: Have ye any that are sick among you? Bring them hither. Have ye any that are lame, or blind, or halt, or maimed, or leprous, or that are withered, or that are deaf, or that are afflicted in any manner? Bring them hither and I will heal them, for I have compassion upon you; my bowels are filled with mercy.

children.name: hear
children.sourceText: That other sheep I have which are not of this fold; them also I must bring, and they shall hear my voice; and there shall be one fold, and one shepherd.

children.name: heard
children.sourceText: Ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, and it is also written before you, that thou shalt not kill, and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment of God;

children.name: hearest
children.sourceText: Father, thou hast given them the Holy Ghost because they believe in me; and thou seest that they believe in me because thou hearest them, and they pray unto me; and they pray unto me because I am with them.

children.name: heareth
children.sourceText: Therefore, whoso heareth these sayings of mine and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, who built his house upon a rock,

children.name: hearken
children.sourceText: But if they will repent and hearken unto my words, and harden not their hearts, I will establish my church among them, and they shall come in unto the covenant and be numbered among this the remnant of Jacob, unto whom I have given this land for their inheritance;

children.name: heart
children.sourceText: And blessed are all the pure in heart, for they shall see God.

children.name: hearts
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: heathen
children.sourceText: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen, for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.

children.name: heaven
children.sourceText: I give unto you power that ye shall baptize this people when I am again ascended into heaven.

children.name: heed
children.sourceText: Blessed are ye if ye shall give heed unto the words of these twelve whom I have chosen from among you to minister unto you, and to be your servants; and unto them I have given power that they may baptize you with water; and after that ye are baptized with water, behold, I will baptize you with fire and with the Holy Ghost; therefore blessed are ye if ye shall believe in me and be baptized, after that ye have seen me and know that I am.

children.name: hell
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that this is my doctrine, and whoso buildeth upon this buildeth upon my rock, and the gates of hell shall not prevail against them.

children.name: hewn
children.sourceText: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.

children.name: hid
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the light of this people. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid.

children.name: hill
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, I give unto you to be the light of this people. A city that is set on a hill cannot be hid.

children.name: hiss
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: hold
children.sourceText: No man can serve two masters; for either he will hate the one and love the other, or else he will hold to the one and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and Mammon.

children.name: homes
children.sourceText: Therefore, go ye unto your homes, and ponder upon the things which I have said, and ask of the Father, in my name, that ye may understand, and prepare your minds for the morrow, and I come unto you again.

children.name: house
children.sourceText: Behold, do men light a candle and put it under a bushel? Nay, but on a candlestick, and it giveth light to all that are in the house;

children.name: humility
children.sourceText: And again, more blessed are they who shall believe in your words because that ye shall testify that ye have seen me, and that ye know that I am. Yea, blessed are they who shall believe in your words, and come down into the depths of humility and be baptized, for they shall be visited with fire and with the Holy Ghost, and shall receive a remission of their sins.

children.name: hunger
children.sourceText: And blessed are all they who do hunger and thirst after righteousness, for they shall be filled with the Holy Ghost.

children.name: hurt
children.sourceText: But behold, the life of my servant shall be in my hand; therefore they shall not hurt him, although he shall be marred because of them. Yet I will heal him, for I will show unto them that my wisdom is greater than the cunning of the devil.

children.name: hypocrisy
children.sourceText: And thus commandeth the Father that I should say unto you: At that day when the Gentiles shall sin against my gospel, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel, and shall be lifted up in the pride of their hearts above all nations, and above all the people of the whole earth, and shall be filled with all manner of lyings, and of deceits, and of mischiefs, and all manner of hypocrisy, and murders, and priestcrafts, and whoredoms, and of secret abominations; and if they shall do all those things, and shall reject the fulness of my gospel,saith the Father,

children.name: hypocrite
children.sourceText: Thou hypocrite, first cast the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast the mote out of thy brother's eye.

children.name: hypocrites
children.sourceText: Therefore, when ye shall do your alms do not sound a trumpet before you, as will hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, they have their reward.

children.name: immerse
children.sourceText: And then shall ye immerse them in the water, and come forth again out of the water.

children.name: immortality
children.sourceText: And ye shall never endure the pains of death; but when I shall come in my glory ye shall be changed in the twinkling of an eye from mortality to immortality; and then shall ye be blessed in the kingdom of my Father.

children.name: inhabited
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, all these things shall surely come, even as the Father hath commanded me. Then shall this covenant which the Father hath covenanted with his people be fulfilled; and then shall Jerusalem be inhabited again with my people, and it shall be the land of their inheritance.

children.name: inherit
children.sourceText: And whoso believeth in me, and is baptized, the same shall be saved; and they are they who shall inherit the kingdom of God.

children.name: inheritance
children.sourceText: And behold, this is the land of your inheritance; and the Father hath given it unto you.

children.name: iniquities
children.sourceText: The Father having raised me up unto you first, and sent me to bless you in turning away every one of you from his iniquities; and this because ye are the children of the covenant,

children.name: iniquity
children.sourceText: And then will I profess unto them: I never knew you; depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

children.name: is
children.sourceText: For verily, verily I say unto you, he that hath the spirit of contention is not of me, but is of the devil, who is the father of contention, and he stirreth up the hearts of men to contend with anger, one with another.

children.name: Isaiah
children.sourceText: And then the words of the prophet Isaiah shall be fulfilled, which say:

children.name: Israel
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: it shall come to pass
children.sourceText: And I say unto you, that if the Gentiles do not repent after the blessing which they shall receive, after they have scattered my people, Then shall ye, who are a remnant of the house of Jacob, go forth among them; and ye shall be in the midst of them who shall be many; and ye shall be among them saith the Father, saith the Father, And it shall come to pass that I will establish my people, O house of Israel.

children.name: Jacob
children.sourceText: Then shall ye, who are a remnant of the house of Jacob, go forth among them; and ye shall be in the midst of them who shall be many; and ye shall be among them

children.name: Jerusalem
children.sourceText: And not at any time hath the Father given me commandment that I should tell it unto your brethren at Jerusalem.

children.name: jesus
children.sourceText: Behold, I am Jesus Christ, whom the prophets testified shall come into the world.

children.name: Jews
children.sourceText: So great faith have I never seen among all the Jews; wherefore I could not show unto them so great miracles, because of their unbelief.

children.name: John
children.sourceText: Behold, I know your thoughts, and ye have desired the thing which John, my beloved, who was with me in my ministry, before that I was lifted up by the Jews, desired of me.

children.name: Joseph
children.sourceText: Ye are my disciples; and ye are a light unto this people, who are a remnant of the house of Joseph.

children.name: jot
children.sourceText: For verily I say unto you, one jot nor tittle hath not passed away from the law, but in me it hath all been fulfilled.

children.name: joy
children.sourceText: For ye shall have great joy and be exceedingly glad, for great shall be your reward in heaven; for so persecuted they the prophets who were before you.

children.name: judge
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Judge not, that ye be not judged.

children.name: judged
children.sourceText: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Judge not, that ye be not judged.

children.name: judges
children.sourceText: And know ye that ye shall be judges of this people, according to the judgment which I shall give unto you, which shall be just. Therefore, what manner of men ought ye to be? Verily I say unto you, even as I am.

children.name: judgment
children.sourceText: Ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, and it is also written before you, that thou shalt not kill, and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment of God;

children.name: judgments
children.sourceText: And because of the mercies of the Father unto the Gentiles, and also the judgments of the Father upon my people who are of the house of Israel, verily, verily, I say unto you, that after all this, and I have caused my people who are of the house of Israel to be smitten, and to be afflicted, and to be slain, and to be cast out from among them, and to become hated by them, and to become a hiss and a byword among them;

children.name: justice
children.sourceText: And he that endureth not unto the end, the same is he that is also hewn down and cast into the fire, from whence they can no more return, because of the justice of the Father.

children.name: keep
children.sourceText: Therefore come unto me and be ye saved; for verily I say unto you, that except ye shall keep my commandments, which I have commanded you at this time, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.

children.name: kept
children.sourceText: And I command you that ye shall write these sayings after I am gone, that if it so be that my people at Jerusalem, they who have seen me and been with me in my ministry, do not ask the Father in my name, that they may receive a knowledge of you by the Holy Ghost, and also of the other tribes whom they know not of, that these sayings which ye shall write shall be kept and shall be manifested unto the Gentiles, that through the fulness of the Gentiles, the remnant of their seed, who shall be scattered forth upon the face of the earth because of their unbelief, may be brought in, or may be brought to a knowledge of me, their Redeemer.

children.name: kill
children.sourceText: Ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, and it is also written before you, that thou shalt not kill, and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment of God;

children.name: kingdom
children.sourceText: And whoso believeth in me, and is baptized, the same shall be saved; and they are they who shall inherit the kingdom of God.

children.name: knew
children.sourceText: And then will I profess unto them: I never knew you; depart from me, ye that work iniquity.

children.name: knock
children.sourceText: Ask, and it shall be given unto you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

children.name: knocketh
children.sourceText: For every one that asketh, receiveth; and he that seeketh, findeth; and to him that knocketh, it shall be opened.

children.name: know
children.sourceText: Arise and come forth unto me, that ye may thrust your hands into my side, and also that ye may feel the prints of the nails in my hands and in my feet, that ye may know that I am the God of Israel, and the God of the whole earth, and have been slain for the sins of the world.

children.name: knoweth
children.sourceText: Be not ye therefore like unto them, for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of before ye ask him.

children.name: knowledge
children.sourceText: And I command you that ye shall write these sayings after I am gone, that if it so be that my people at Jerusalem, they who have seen me and been with me in my ministry, do not ask the Father in my name, that they may receive a knowledge of you by the Holy Ghost, ...or may be brought to a knowledge of me, their Redeemer.

children.name: known
children.sourceText: And behold, this is the thing which I will give unto you for a sign, for verily I say unto you that when these things which I declare unto you, and which I shall declare unto you hereafter of myself, and by the power of the Holy Ghost which shall be given unto you of the Father, shall be made known unto the Gentiles that they may know concerning this people who are a remnant of the house of Jacob, and concerning this my people who shall be scattered by them;

children.name: Lamanite
children.sourceText: Verily I say unto you, I commanded my servant Samuel, the Lamanite, that he should testify unto this people, that at the day that the Father should glorify his name in me that there were many saints who should arise from the dead, and should appear unto many, and should minister unto them.Was it not so?

children.name: land
children.sourceText: And behold, this is the land of your inheritance; and the Father hath given it unto you.

children.name: law
children.sourceText: Think not that I am come to destroy the law or the prophets. I am not come to destroy but to fulfil;

children.name: lay
